summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4376 for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast from East 40th Street to Ravenna Boulevard, by the construction of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51773, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
